Articles.Content:
Merry Christmas! I can't wait to watch the video!

EDIT: Forgot about that video, always loved it.

Edited December 24, 2015 by legoclone09

I haven't seen that video in a while. Good to see it again  

Happy holidays to you guys too!

For a moment there I expected them to slap together a set of MechDeer mounted in asparagus formation to pull the sleigh.

/wanders off humming to the tune of such oldtime holiday favourites as "You Broke the Nose-coned R.A.P.I.E.R.",  "HO LF Might", "Strut The Hulls", "I'm Dreaming of an Aldrin Thesis", "Wake Me Up Before the NERV Blows", "Make it Go, Make it Go, Make it Go", and of course "All I Want For This Patch: Hex Truss".

Call now, and you get a bonus CD with "St. Tsiolkovsky Is Solving That Frown", "The Most Oberthful Transfer of the Year", "The Bell That Couldn't Gimbal", and "The Greatest Thrust of All"! Call now!

(I really need to stop leaving that TV on at night...)
1.1 is in that bag...somewhere...It's a really big bag though, so it'll take quite a while to find. Take your time, Squad, and happy holidays!

4 hours ago, swjr-swis said:

For a moment there I expected them to slap together a set of MechDeer mounted in asparagus formation to pull the sleigh.

/wanders off humming to the tune of such oldtime holiday favourites as "You Broke the Nose-coned R.A.P.I.E.R.",  "HO LF Might", "Strut The Hulls", "I'm Dreaming of an Aldrin Thesis", "Wake Me Up Before the NERV Blows", "Make it Go, Make it Go, Make it Go", and of course "All I Want For This Patch: Hex Truss".

Call now, and you get a bonus CD with "St. Tsiolkovsky Is Solving That Frown", "The Most Oberthful Transfer of the Year", "The Bell That Couldn't Gimbal", and "The Greatest Thrust of All"! Call now!

(I really need to stop leaving that TV on at night...)

Quick! Call Weird Al!

Well, that didn't look stock.
Are we getting a MOD Squad?

To be honest, I was expecting a decent twenty seconds-two minutes video, so the idea of reposting the same Christmas video you made 3 years ago doesn't feel like much...

 

But hey, you made an original six-second vine video wishing everyone a happy holiday, so, I guess...

...thank you.

(For those who are unaware, I am mentioning this; https://vine.co/v/iAmAmV55eWj)

Spoiler

(Apologies, I cannot get rid of this Spoiler box, so just ignore it)

Edited December 25, 2015 by Fred Cop

15 hours ago, swjr-swis said:

For a moment there I expected them to slap together a set of MechDeer mounted in asparagus formation to pull the sleigh.

/wanders off humming to the tune of such oldtime holiday favourites as "You Broke the Nose-coned R.A.P.I.E.R.",  "HO LF Might", "Strut The Hulls", "I'm Dreaming of an Aldrin Thesis", "Wake Me Up Before the NERV Blows", "Make it Go, Make it Go, Make it Go", and of course "All I Want For This Patch: Hex Truss".

Call now, and you get a bonus CD with "St. Tsiolkovsky Is Solving That Frown", "The Most Oberthful Transfer of the Year", "The Bell That Couldn't Gimbal", and "The Greatest Thrust of All"! Call now!

(I really need to stop leaving that TV on at night...)

A Kerbal version of Jingle Bells:

 

Riding through the sky

In a rocket-powered sleigh

Over Kerbin we fly,

Burning all the way!

We have a ton of fuel,

And lots and lots of snacks.

We're going so much faster than that old, gray Cadillac!

 

Oh,

Delta-V: .1c!

That's so insanely fast,

We'll get to all these houses

Before seven seconds pass.

Oh,

Delta-V: .1c!

Come on for the ride

As we swing right past Kerbol

And enjoy some sun-cooked fries!
Cute! Very festive! But isn't it a little outdated? Anyway, Merry Khristmas, and a Happy New Year! Happy landings!
wouldn't it be awesome if there were official Kerbal Santa and elf costumes?( Although Winter Kerbol is fine too)

Happy holidays to you all

Edited December 25, 2015 by DirkLarien
see you guys next year
